title: Dissolved oxygen forecasting in the Mississippi River: advanced ensemble machine learning models
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4VA00119B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Francesco Granata, Senlin Zhu, Fabio Di Nunno
This study introduces advanced ensemble machine learning models for predicting dissolved oxygen in the Mississippi River, offering high accuracy across various forecast horizons and improving environmental monitoring.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
